rules_text:
First strike, lifelink
Tap two untapped tokens you control: Eni gets +1/+1 until end of turn. If this is the second time this ability has resolved this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on it instead. If it's the third time, Eni also gains double strike until end of turn.
flavor_text: [i]Clad in a suit of living oldsteel, the masked warrior quickly earned a place in Alacsis's elite.[/i]
